div.p: The BBC on Politicians with MySpace pages:

blockquote.p: In the UK, Liberal Democrat leader Sir Menzies Campbell has registered on MySpace -- and has an unofficial fan club page, "Proud to be a Minger", with 161 members.

Meanwhile, the Boris Johnson Appreciation Society, which recognises the shadow higher education minister as "the vital free agent of British politics", has stacked up a very respectable 7,751 members.
